function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of harmful fuels for lighting","Impact":"Increased risk of indoor air pollution and respiratory diseases","Mitigation":"Transition to cleaner and more efficient fuels and lighting sources","Technologies":"Clean energy technologies such as solar panels and energy-efficient stoves","People":"Households using kerosene, candles, and other harmful fuels","Owner":"Government agencies, non-profit organizations, and clean energy advocates"},{"Description":"Slow progress in the adoption of cleaner fuels","Impact":"Continued reliance on biomass fuels and indoor air pollution for decades","Mitigation":"Accelerate the transition to cleaner fuels through targeted socio-economic development initiatives","Technologies":"Energy-efficient stoves, distribution of clean cooking solutions","People":"Poor households in developing regions","Owner":"International organizations, government agencies, and clean energy advocates"},{"Description":"Low global access to clean cooking","Impact":"Inadequate access to clean cooking leading to persistent health impacts from indoor air pollution","Mitigation":"Increase the global access to clean cooking through accelerated growth and distribution of clean cooking solutions","Technologies":"Solar cookers, biogas stoves, clean energy distribution networks","People":"Underprivileged populations worldwide","Owner":"Global health organizations, clean energy advocates, and government agencies"}]}
